title: Exploción Gigantesca de Romance
description: Surprises, betrayal, kidnapping, and murder! Follow the complex lives of Corrine, Maria, Ronaldo, and Chad as they fight to live and love.
quote: I have a package for you.
altHero: Chad (played by Shawn), in a UPS uniform, stands awkwardly on the stairs behind Corrine
alt1: Maria answers the door for the UPS man
alt2: Chad the UPS man holding a small package
alt4: Corrine looks sad with a tissue in her hand
